subject: Football
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Payton, a former Giants assistant who had seemed a potential candidate to replace Tom Coughlin as their coach, said he would stay with the Saints “as long as they’ll have me.”
snippet: Payton, a former Giants assistant who had seemed a potential candidate to replace Tom Coughlin as their coach, said he would stay with the Saints “as long as they’ll have me.”
